cases.description: Score 0 - no criteria met, no fever, no features
cases.source: McCrindle BW, et al. Circulation. 2017;135(17):e927-e999. All 0 = Criteria Not Met.

cases.description: Score 3 - fever plus 2 features, consider incomplete Kawasaki
cases.source: McCrindle BW, et al. Circulation. 2017. Fever (+1) + Extremity changes (+1) + Conjunctival (+1) = 3.

cases.description: Score 4 - fever plus 3 features, borderline, consider incomplete Kawasaki
cases.source: McCrindle BW, et al. Circulation. 2017. Fever (+1) + Extremity changes (+1) + Exanthem (+1) + Oral changes (+1) = 4.

cases.description: Score 5 - classic Kawasaki Disease: fever plus 4 features
cases.source: McCrindle BW, et al. Circulation. 2017. Fever (+1) + Extremity (+1) + Exanthem (+1) + Conjunctival (+1) + Oral changes (+1) = 5.

cases.description: Maximum score 6 - all criteria met including all 5 principal features
cases.source: McCrindle BW, et al. Circulation. 2017. Fever (+1) + All 5 features (+5) = 6.
